Name: UniFont Writer
About the game: Are you tired of the hassle to copy and paste your text to a website in order to convert it to your desired Unicode text? Do you want to directly input Unicode styled text into an application window? Then UniFont Writer is the best fit for you! With UniFont Writer you can directly input Unicode styled text to any application window that supports Unicode text encoding. Just select one of the available fontsets, toggle the tool and then type in your text. Additionally you can create your own fontsets and use them with UniFont Writer.
